fullForm: All India Law Entrance Test, Post Graduation
eligibility: Candidates must have an LL.B. or equivalent law degree with a minimum of 50% marks (45% for SC/ST/Persons with Disabilities). Final year LL.B. students may also apply.
subjectsTested: Law (various branches including Constitutional Law, Jurisprudence, and other subjects of law)
negativeMarking: Yes (0.25 marks deducted for each wrong answer)

faqs.question: What is the mode of the AILET PG exam?
faqs.answer: AILET PG is conducted in offline mode as a pen and paper-based test.
